body_text:
How did Isaac of Baccano survive getting shot? I had assumed Isaac survived the ceremonial gunshot for inducting Firo because he had been already immortal as he and Miria had consumed the "wine" before raiding the Martillo.
Is this the case? I did read somewhere that Isaac, Miria and the Martillo became immortal in the party soon afterward.

How did Isaac and Miria became immortals? In one of the final episodes, Chez notices Isaac is immortal when he's trying to save him from falling off the train.
Isaac also got shot, and beaten down.
However, he didn't drink the "sake" he and Miria stole from the mob, did he?
How did he and Miria became immortals?
